long_description: The classy Sunday Afternoons Verona hat compliments any look with its mix-color weave and matching ribbon tie. Polyester fabric provides UPF 50+ protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Hat packs flat for travel and snaps back to shape when you're ready to wear it. 3-in.-wide brim shades your face and neck from the sun. Matching ribbon tie lets you adjust the fit. Grosgrain sweatband wicks moisture off your brow.
short_description: The classy Sunday Afternoons Verona hat compliments any look with its mix-color weave and matching ribbon tie.
